name: Diabetic diet
explanation: No sugar, little fat, no battered or breaded products, no alcohol

name: Gluten free food
explanation: When incompatibility to gluten (gluten protein): the usage of gluten free flours

name: Reduction food
explanation: Calorie-reduced meals, rich on dietary fibre, low on fat and carbohydrates

name: Low cholesterol food
explanation: Less than 100 mg cholesterol, no animal fats, no egg yolk

name: Low sodium food
explanation: For cardiovascular and kidney problems: cooking salt free, low fat, non-flatulent, without alcohol

name: Vegetarian meal (Western)
explanation: No meat or fish products, without alcohol, no dairy products and eggs

name: Vegetarian meal (Lacto-Ovo)
explanation: Meal without meat (although dairy products and eggs are allowed)

name: Vegetarian asian meal (Indian)
explanation: Meal without meat prepared and spiced Indian style

name: Vegetarian meal (Oriental)
explanation: Meal without meat or fish, prepared and spiced in an oriental style. Please order this menu via the Lufthansa Service Centre only.

name: Fruit meal
explanation: Meal made with fruit (raw and fresh fruit, without meat)

name: Light whole food
explanation: Light diet for the stomach, bowel, liver, gall

name: Meal without fish
explanation: Contains no seafood, mussels or similar products

name: Kosher meal
explanation: Strictly kosher food prepared under the supervision of a rabbinate

name: Muslim meal
explanation: No use of pork, no venison and no alcohol used. Usage of halal standard certified meat- and poultry products exclusively.
